attributes.title: A complete disgrace
attributes.review: I was extremely excited to learn more about all the politics going around, maybe even support the amazing orange, but this app was so incredibly bad my whole house just collapsed. It took a horrendous amount of time to download and once it did it played the most awful music I have ever heard. My ears started to bleed and the children I keep in my basement started to mutate into this disgusting creatures so I used the app the kill them but it only made them multiple. Now I’m hiding in the sewers and it’s all this apps fault😤🤬

attributes.title: BAD BAD BAD BAD 😡😡👎👎👎👎
attributes.review: there is just SO many things wrong with this app. took FOREVER to download 🤬🤬🤬 might want to get that checked out luv 🥰🥰 AND It just made my phone glitch it’s so terrible DO NOT RECOMMEND GETTING IT ❤️ you guys could do so much better ✨ don’t get this poopy app 🧚‍♀️ unless you like having your phone break 💫😾💅😘😌 I just put so much trust into this app..thinking it would work and be great. I got the complete opposite of that!!! 👿👿👹👹👺👺 so many things have to be worked on. I’m disappointed...truly disappointed 😔. PLEASE FIX THIS MONSTROSITY!!!! 😡🤬

attributes.title: Rip to my cat
attributes.review: I was so excited for this app from him but when I opened it up there was this voice coming from the app telling me to inject myself with bleach I was really confused but I would do anything our president orange would tell me to so I was gonna go downstairs to drink some bleach but some orange skinned man broke into my house and started r*ping my cat so hard that she died and now when I looked at the man he attacked me now I have some kind of bit on my arm and my skin is slowly turning orange I think it infected me with some kind of orange zombie virus

attributes.title: #notrump2020
attributes.review: Trump is the stupidest president ever all he does is makes kids go in cages and saying that black people live in low com neighborhoods but we wouldn’t have to live in low com neighborhoods if we had a better president you are racist to mostly every race that isn’t white and it’s sad I wish Obama was still here even you’re son doesn’t like you he seems sad and so does you wife she doesn’t even wanna hold ur hand and typed help on a twitter comment I wonder how she feels about you #trumpshouldbecancanceledlikechasehudson

attributes.title: Nothing grand
attributes.review: Downloaded to get myself more educated and into politics but was greatly disappointed :// Not only did the content hold false information and bore me quite a bit, the app glitched and exited me out every time I tried to open it?? I had to restart my phone every time just to go into the app. I also was unable to run any other app unless I restarted my phone again after opening this one. Think it seriously messed up my phone and it wasn’t what I thought it would be.

i opened the app just to find a big cheesy orange cheeto puff which was weird because i thought it was supposed to be the app for the president 🤷🏻‍♀️ but anyways it’s crazy how people are STILL supporting him after he has raped a 13 year old,, not supportive of the LGBTQ+ ,, a RACIST ,, a liar ,, he can never admit when he’s wrong ,, he disrespects women especially when it comes to his reports yet claims he respects women them more than  anymore , but we all know there’s plenty more that he’s done ✨😻🧚🏼‍♀️ other than that i hope y’all have a great day 😆

attributes.title: i’m not disappointed just angry
attributes.review: i’m SO angry. i got this app and some of the reviews were saying that this app was very good but when i got it it took HOURS to download and then it made my phone glitch then it wouldn’t WORK. i had to get it fix which was super expensive. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP also because our president is horrible and hasn’t help with anything and doesn’t support the +LGTBQ community WE SRW ALL THE SAME!! and not to say the he might be apart of some illegal things if you support him. you are supporting his horrible decisions. GIVE US BACK OBAMA!!!!!

attributes.title: Horrible app ✨🧚🏼
attributes.review: This was an EXTREMELY horrible app!! It took 3 whole days to install and when I finally could open it in an instant my anime collection burned to ashes and bees started swarming in my room which I am very allergic to their stings! So I hid under my blanket and kept looking for information in the app about the president and stuff but the more I looked the worse things got! My pet bird got stung by multiple bees and the whole app is just talking about a white supremacist and why he should be re-elected! I do NOT suggest getting this app

attributes.title: This app is absolutely horrendous and it keeps crashing and glitching my phone
attributes.review: Honestly this is such a horrible app as it was just crashing no matter what and left my phone glitching for the longest time!! Like I’ve been sitting here and realizing how horrible this app was as well as for the fact that trump is literally the worst president so the fact that this app is the worst out there doesn’t surprise me!✨honestly made me feel dead and caused stress✨🌟 beyond my years ⛈ and you know it actually killed my FBI agent in my phone💀👁👅👁

attributes.title: It made my kids sick
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for me and my kids and a week after my kids started getting sick. I went to the doctors and they told me that my kid know has the mark of the trumps. My kid is now a racist little trump supporter and keeps yelling I’m gonna deport you anywhere we go. I wish I could say that my kid will be normal again but his turning to a mini trump. His hair is falling out and growing out yellow corn hair. I’m scared his skin is turning to a different shade of orange every single day. Maybe one day I’ll have my kid back but only time will tell
